    Calculating Federal and State Income Taxes Description of Input Columns Description of Output Columns Manually Upload Data to TAXSIM32

Description of Output Columns

Shane Orr

Source: vignettes/taxsim-output.Rmd
taxsim-output.Rmd

usincometaxes returns tax results as a data frame, with each column representing tax information such as federal and state income taxes owed or other line items. Each row corresponds to a row in the input data frame. Users can specify the amount of output with the return_all_information parameter in taxsim_calculate_taxes(). Setting return_all_information to TRUE returns a data frame with 42 columns of detailed tax information. FALSE returns 9 columns of key information. FALSE leads to quicker calculations and downloads from the NBER’s servers.

usincometaxes provides the same output as TAXSIM 35. Setting return_all_information to FALSE equates to setting idtl to 0 in TAXSIM, while TRUE corresponds to 2.

Standard columns

Returned columns when return_all_information = FALSE.

  • id_number: ID number from the input data set, so users can match the tax information with the input data set.
  • federal_taxes: Federal income tax liability including capital gains rates, surtaxes, AMT and refundable and non-refundable credits.
  • state_taxes: State income tax liability.
  • fica_taxes: Total FICA taxes, including the employers and employees share.
  • federal_marginal_rate: Marginal federal tax rate.
  • state_marginal_rate: Marginal state tax rate, if a state was identified.
  • fica_rate: FICA rate.

Detailed columns

Returned columns when return_all_information = TRUE.

  • All standard columns.
  • federal_agi: Federal AGI
  • ui_agi: UI in AGI
  • soc_sec_agi: Social Security in AGI
  • zero_bracket_amount: Zero Bracket Amount
  • personal_exemptions: Personal Exemptions
  • exemption_phaseout: Exemption Phaseout
  • deduction_phaseout: Deduction Phaseout
  • itemized_deductions: Itemized Deductions Allowed (Zero for non-itemizers)
  • federal_taxable_income: Federal Taxable Income
  • tax_on_taxable_income: Tax on Taxable Income (no special capital gains rates)
  • exemption_surtax: Exemption Surtax
  • general_tax_credit: General Tax Credit
  • child_tax_credit_adjusted: Child Tax Credit (as adjusted)
  • child_tax_credit_refundable: Additional Child Tax Credit (refundable)
  • child_care_credit: Child Care Credit
  • eitc: Earned Income Credit (total federal)
  • amt_income: Income for the Alternative Minimum Tax
  • amt_liability: AMT Liability after credit for regular tax and other allowed credits.
  • fed_income_tax_before_credit:Federal Income Tax Before Credits (includes special treatment of Capital gains, exemption surtax (1988-1996) and 15% rate phaseout (1988-1990) but not AMT)
  • fica: FICA
  • medicare_tax_unearned_income: Medicare Tax on Unearned Income
  • medicare_tax_earned_income: Medicare Tax on Earned Income
  • cares_recovery_rebate: CARES act Recovery Rebates

The following columns are zero if no state is specified:

  • state_household_income: State Household Income (imputation for property tax credit)
  • state_rent_expense: State Rent Expense (imputation for property tax credit)
  • state_agi: State AGI
  • state_exemption_amount: State Exemption amount
  • state_std_deduction_amount: State Standard Deduction
  • state_itemized_deducation: State Itemized Deductions
  • state_taxable_income: State Taxable Income
  • state_property_tax_credit: State Property Tax Credit
  • state_child_care_credit: State Child Care Credit
  • state_eitc: State EIC
  • state_total_credits: State Total Credits
  • state_bracket_rate: State Bracket Rate
  • self_emp_income: Earned Self-Employment Income for FICA

Mapping usincometaxes columns to TAXSIM 32 columns

Results from usincometaxes include all output from TAXSIM 32. The table below maps usincometaxes output column names to TAXSIM 32 output column names.

usincometaxes TAXSIM
id_number taxsimid
year year
state state
federal_taxes fiitax
state_taxes siitax
fica_taxes fica
federal_marginal_rate frate
state_marginal_rate srate
fica_rate ficar
federal_agi v10
ui_agi v11
soc_sec_agi v12
zero_bracket_amount v13
personal_exemptions v14
exemption_phaseout v15
deduction_phaseout v16
itemized_deductions v17
federal_taxable_income v18
tax_on_taxable_income v19
exemption_surtax v20
general_tax_credit v21
child_tax_credit_adjusted v22
child_tax_credit_refundable v23
child_care_credit v24
eitc v25
amt_income v26
amt_liability v27
fed_income_tax_before_credit v28
fica v29
state_household_income v30
state_rent_expense v31
state_agi v32
state_exemption_amount v33
state_std_deduction_amount v34
state_itemized_deducation v35
state_taxable_income v36
state_property_tax_credit v37
state_child_care_credit v38
state_eitc v39
state_total_credits v40
state_bracket_rate v41
self_emp_income v42
medicare_tax_unearned_income v43
medicare_tax_earned_income v44
cares_recovery_rebate v45
